member.name: T:BestChat.Platform.Common.IDieable
member.summary: Provides a way to inform interested callers that the sender isn't valid any more and should be discarded.

member.name: T:BestChat.Platform.Common.IDieable.OnDieing
member.summary: Tells the caller the object is going away.

member.name: E:BestChat.Platform.Common.IDieable.evtDieing
member.summary: Fired when the object is dieing
